data.text: The Earth is billions of years old.
Archaeologists are scientists who study things that are very old.
Scientists who study how people live and behave are called anthropologists.
Early people lived in caves. They used to hunt animals and gather fruits to live on. They used weapons and tools made of stone.
Over time, the early people discovered fire and learnt how to light a fire themselves and cook food.
The early people invented the wheel and the axle. These two inventions changed human life completely.
